item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Why my apps will soon be gone from the Google Play Store (12 points | 1 comment)
2. Show HN: Flyon UI – Free Tailwind Components Library (54 points | 9 comments)
3. The Fastest Mutexes (699 points | 260 comments)
4. An adult fruit fly brain has been mapped (389 points | 123 comments)
5. Study: Cats in little crocheted hats shed light on feline chronic pain (54 points | 8 comments)
6. Gamma radiation is produced in large tropical thunderstorms, observations reveal (39 points | 30 comments)
7. Type-erased generic functions for C: A modest non-proposal (21 points | 1 comment)
8. I Taught My 8yo Subduction Zones with NotebookLM (38 points | 11 comments)
9. In Mexico’s underwater caves, a glimpse of artifacts, fossils and human remains (119 points | 34 comments)
10. Filed: WP Engine Inc. v Automattic Inc. and Matthew Charles Mullenweg [pdf] (308 points | 325 comments)
11. Salt Water Dimmers (53 points | 39 comments)
12. AMD GPU Inference (212 points | 78 comments)
13. Meta confirms it trains its AI on any image you ask Ray-Ban Meta AI to analyze (6 points | discuss)
14. Who Pays for the Arts? (31 points | 49 comments)
15. A Tour of Hell – Shell scripting Haskell dialect (105 points | 19 comments)
16. The bunkbed conjecture is false (149 points | 46 comments)
17. Microsoft: 'ever present' AI assistants are coming (8 points | discuss)
18. Hierarchical Navigable Small World: a scalable nearest neighbor search (85 points | 3 comments)
19. A subtle change to the iPhone’s contact-sharing permissions (54 points | 70 comments)
20. Solving the Maker-Taker Problem (9 points | 5 comments)
21. WALDO: Whereabouts Ascertainment for Low-Lying Detectable Objects (82 points | 32 comments)
22. Newton's financial misadventures in the South Sea Bubble (2018) (55 points | 25 comments)
23. Meticulous (YC S21) is hiring to eliminate UI tests ( | hide)
24. Bronze Age cheese reveals human-Lactobacillus interactions over history (4 points | discuss)
25. Hash Ordering and Hyrum's Law (68 points | 20 comments)
26. CEO of Wordpress.com Cries Foul and Threatens Me with Legal Action (38 points | 5 comments)
27. Tracking the historical events that lead to the interweaving of knowledge (2021) (30 points | 3 comments)
28. Alert Evaluations: Incremental Merges in ClickHouse (15 points | 6 comments)
29. Keynes on the influence of furniture on love (61 points | 32 comments)
30. American WWII bomb explodes at Japanese airport, causing large crater in taxiway (317 points | 259 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
